title: Championship Thresh Skin Code Giveaway
body:
Hey there,

Recently bought one of those Championship Thresh figures when they had the restock last month and it just arrived. I've already got the Champ Thresh skin from last year, so thought I'd give away the skin code to someone who could get some use out of it instead. I assume it operates like other skin codes in that if you don't own the champ but put the code in you'll get the champ as well as the skin you're claiming.

According to the card you need to go to champthresh.leagueoflegends.com in order to enter the promo code and claim the skin (Expires on Nov 16th for reference, though I'm sure it won't last that long). Promo code follows:

AMWC5E55AEEE4PRA

If you don't mind, just throw a post in here when you grab it since it's first come first serve, so it'll save time for others. Enjoy! :D

replies.body: It was already claimed a couple days ago by another user. Sorry about that though, better luck in the future! :)
thanks for the skin bro, the code worked for me
Oh, cool! Good to know someone got it then. You're welcome. :D

The link or the code? It's possible you might need to claim in in the client store under the promo code section instead.

If that also doesn't work let me know and I'll try getting in contact with support and seeing what I can do. :)
